+def _get_fixed_tag_versions(tag_versions: List) -> List:
+    # Due to various prefixes that devs choose for tags, strip them down to semantic version numbers only.
+    # Store it inside the dict ("ver1.2.3": "1.2.3") and parse the value to get the correct sort.
+    # Return the original value (key) once everything is parsed/sorted.
+    fixed_tag_versions: Dict = {}
+    for tag in tag_versions:
+        for prefix in re.findall("([a-zA-Z ]*)\\d*.*", tag):
+            if not prefix:
+                continue
+            fixed_tag_versions[tag] = tag[len(prefix) :]
+    try:
+        fixed_tag_versions = {
+            k: v
+            for k, v in sorted(
+                fixed_tag_versions.items(),
+                key=lambda item: parse_version(item[1]),
+                reverse=True,
+            )
+        }
+    except InvalidVersion:
+        pass
+    return list(fixed_tag_versions.keys())
+
+

         click.echo("\n".join(x["message"] for x in value))
     except UnicodeEncodeError:
         click.echo("\n".join(x["fallback"] for x in value))

+000019f0: 3329 2070 7970 726f 6a65 6374 2e74 6f6d  3) pyproject.tom

+00001aa0: 6174 655d 0a64 7279 5f72 756e 203d 2074  ate].dry_run = t
+00001ab0: 7275 650a 616c 6c5f 7665 7273 696f 6e73  rue.all_versions

+00001af0: 203d 205b 2262 6c61 636b 225d 0a60 6060   = ["black"].```
+00001b00: 0a0a 2a2a 4e4f 5445 3a2a 2a20 4966 2073  ..**NOTE:** If s
+00001b10: 6f6d 6520 6f66 2074 6865 206f 7074 696f  ome of the optio
+00001b20: 6e73 2061 7265 206d 6973 7369 6e67 2028  ns are missing (
+00001b30: 666f 7220 6578 616d 706c 6520 6065 7863  for example `exc
+00001b40: 6c75 6465 6020 6f70 7469 6f6e 292c 2060  lude` option), `
+00001b50: 7072 652d 636f 6d6d 6974 2d75 7064 6174  pre-commit-updat
+00001b60: 6560 0a77 696c 6c20 7573 6520 6465 6661  e`.will use defa
+00001b70: 756c 7420 7661 6c75 6520 666f 7220 7468  ult value for th
+00001b80: 6174 206f 7074 696f 6e20 2864 6566 6175  at option (defau
+00001b90: 6c74 2066 6f72 2060 6578 636c 7564 6560  lt for `exclude`
+00001ba0: 206f 7074 696f 6e20 776f 756c 6420 6265   option would be
+00001bb0: 2061 6e20 656d 7074 7920 6c69 7374 292e   an empty list).
+00001bc0: 0a0a 2a2a 2a49 4d50 4f52 5441 4e54 2a2a  ..***IMPORTANT**
+00001bd0: 2a20 4966 2079 6f75 2069 6e76 6f6b 6520  * If you invoke 
+00001be0: 6070 7265 2d63 6f6d 6d69 742d 7570 6461  `pre-commit-upda
+00001bf0: 7465 6020 7769 7468 2061 6e79 2061 7267  te` with any arg
+00001c00: 756d 656e 7473 2028 652e 672e 2060 7072  uments (e.g. `pr
+00001c10: 652d 636f 6d6d 6974 2d75 7064 6174 6520  e-commit-update 
+00001c20: 2d64 6029 2c0a 6070 7970 726f 6a65 6374  -d`),.`pyproject
+00001c30: 2e74 6f6d 6c60 2063 6f6e 6669 6775 7261  .toml` configura
+00001c40: 7469 6f6e 2077 696c 6c20 6265 202a 2a6f  tion will be **o
+00001c50: 7665 7272 6964 6465 6e2a 2a2e 2054 6869  verridden**. Thi
+00001c60: 7320 6d65 616e 7320 7468 6174 2061 6c6c  s means that all
+00001c70: 2074 6865 2061 7267 756d 656e 7473 2070   the arguments p
+00001c80: 6173 7365 6420 7768 696c 650a 6361 6c6c  assed while.call
+00001c90: 696e 6720 6070 7265 2d63 6f6d 6d69 742d  ing `pre-commit-
+00001ca0: 7570 6461 7465 6020 7769 6c6c 2068 6176  update` will hav
+00001cb0: 6520 7072 696f 7269 7479 206f 7665 7220  e priority over 
+00001cc0: 636f 6e66 6967 7572 6174 696f 6e20 6465  configuration de
+00001cd0: 6669 6e65 6420 696e 7369 6465 2060 7079  fined inside `py
+00001ce0: 7072 6f6a 6563 742e 746f 6d6c 602e 0a49  project.toml`..I
